footer.title: ZenMetic - Fast, Quality, Affordable
footer.small1: With millions of products from trusted brands and stores, thousands of items ranging from smartphones to fresh fruits and vegetables, along with ZenNOW's super-fast delivery service, ZenMetic brings you an online shopping experience that starts with trust.
footer.small2: Do you want to hunt for hot deals? ZenMetic has daily hot deals for you! Are you a fan of brands? Official stores are waiting for you. No need to hunt for free shipping codes, because ZenMetic has millions of products in the Freeship+ program, with no limit on the number of orders, saving you precious time. ZenNOW package (Applicable for orders over 200k) saves you money to receive 100% free shipping within 2 hours & same day, applicable for 100% of products, 100% of cities and provinces in Vietnam.
